title: To establish the National Commission on Detainee Treatment.
content: National Commission on Detainee Treatment Act of 2007 - Establishes the National Commission on Detainee Treatment to: (1) conduct a comprehensive review of matters relating to the capture, custody, judicial proceedings, and repatriation of suspected unlawful enemy combatants. And (2) prepare and submit to Congress and the President a final report on Commission recommendations, findings, and conclusions.
